Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Analyte(s): cfb gene region of Streptococcus agalactiae
Specimen Type(s): Vaginal/rectal specimen swabs enriched in Lim broth
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin Molecular Simplexa GBS Direct real-time PCR assay and Positive Control Pack for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus DNA from Lim broth enriched vaginal/rectal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Simplexa GBS Direct is intended for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus nucleic acid from Lim broth enriched vaginal/rectal swabs from antepartum women to aid in determining colonization status; Positive Control Pack is intended for use as a control with the assay.
